name: KingdomDefense
description:
Demonic gates have been opening across the realms of Aeons.
Dark king Yaldabaoth has been released from its imprisonment, and now it seeks vengeance against the celestial beings.
You are the defender of Aeon, and you must protect the holy cities of Aeon and all its protectorates.
The fate of the entire creation rests on your campaign against these dark enemies.

This game combines tower defense, MOBA, and RPG elements.
Your objective is to defend the ally castle before the countdown timer expires. if the castle stands still after the countdown is over, the victory is yours to claim.
Enemies will constantly spawn from the dark gate on the opposite side of the game field, and more powerful enemies will spawn in greater number as the countdown timer draws closer to the expiration.
You can strategically plan to use the gold gained from slaughtering the enemies to maximize your chance of victory.

There are five game levels and a tutorial stage to help you learn the basics of the gameplay mechanics.
You can also save your progress at any time during the game.
